sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.description: Tool to lookup IMA data intake criteria
sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.inputs: [{"name":"search_type","description":"Search type","value":"hybrid"},{"name":"query","description":"search query for retrieving relevant information from Knowledge Table"},{"name":"search_profile","value":"next_experience_search_configuration","label":"Next Experience Search Configuration","description":"Search profile"},{"name":"sources","label":["Knowledge Table"],"value":["kb_knowledge"],"description":"Search sources"},{"name":"fields","label":["Article body [kb_knowledge]","Short description [kb_knowledge]"],"value":["kb_knowledge.text","kb_knowledge.short_description"],"description":"Fields to be returned"},{"name":"semantic_index_names","label":["body","title"],"value":["body","title"],"description":"Semantic indexed fields"},{"name":"document_match_threshold","value":0,"description":"Document matching threshold"}]
sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.name: Data Intake Criteria Lookup
